Un excelente juego, me trae muchos viejos recuerdos de cuando solia jugarlo con amigos en el pasado, horas interminables de diversion asegurada, toda ambientada con el caracteristico toque grafico de valve y por supuesto, mucho dinamismo, muchas clases, buenos mapas, etc.

Lo negativo: Faltan mapas, no hay campaÃ±a, faltan modos de juego y el juego a diferencia del DoD Comun no esta muerto y goza de una salud bastante aceptable para un juego que casi tiene 7 aÃ±os, hay una cantidad interesante de servidores con gente y aun mas que estan vacios, con pings de todas las areas del mundo, Con lo cual buscar una partida no tardara mucho tiempo.


No justifica el precio que cuesta, compre el pack de todos los juegos de valve y asi si jueguelo, de lo contrario no lo haga.

otro punto positivo, son los Logros de Steam y al igual que con el Review del juego original, al ser juegos tan viejos, andan en casi cualquier computadora con graficos maximos.

Este es de hace casi 7 aÃ±os, por lo cual me atreveria a decir que en casi cualquier computadora va a andar excelente.

Sin lugar a duda, una excelente opciÃ³n para jugar.

a malincuore recensisco negativamente questo gioco per i seguenti motivi:
1) Logica del danno fatta malissimo
2) sistema delle classi fatto male es: se tu vuoi andare cecchino devi essere stra rapido a selezionare la classe perchÃ¨ se arriva uno prima di te tu devi cambiare classe e quindi dire addio al cecchino, in poche parole se non ti muovi a scegliere la classe che vuoi ti ritrovi che sei COSTRETTO a sceglierne un altra.
3) IL PUNTO PEGGIORE DI STO GIOCO SONO LE ARMI ossia logica del danno di merda come scritto sopra MA SOPRATTUTTO la cosa peggiore Ã¨ il RINCULO ABNORME DELLE ARMI, completamente ingestibili, es il supporto con HMG che a primo impatto direte "cazzo che armona che Ã¨ questa", giÃ  ma non appena provate a sparare SENZA METTENDO IL BIPODE rincullera in una maniera OMFG  che sembra che stai sparando con un cannone o oppure Ã¨ il soldato che Ã¨ uno stecchino e quindi spara e vola via lui perche omg Ã¨ ingestibile cioÃ¨ al SECONDO COLPO CHE SPARI SENZA BIPODE la visuale Ã¨ gia in cielo...per fari capire che rinculo ESAGERATO A DIR POCO ha sta arma e quindi per sparare bene sei costretto a 1) SDRAIARTI PER TERRA E METTERE IL BIPODE ALLA CAMPER o 2) TROVARE UN PUNTO ALTO TIPO UN MURETTO SU CUI APPOGIARVI, li allora oneshotta anche a cross the map, la classe assalto invece cioÃ¨ il thompson e mp40 sei costretto a continuare a premere per sparare senno rincula troppo e i due cecchini oneshottano ache se spari al piede, poi cÃ¨ la classe con il lanciarazzi ma fa cagare al cazzo...
4) LO SCATTO Ã¨ PEGGIO DI QUELLO DI TUTTI I COD PRIMA DI AW, fa 2 M il soldato muore o sbocca peggio di cod veramente, almeno su cod ci sono i perk qui manco quelli....
5) poi vabbe la gente che ti trovi dipende, ci sono quelli bravi ma ci son anche i BM ma vabbe Ã¨ normale questi ci son ovunque.
6) NOIA perchÃ¨ non sali neanche di livello, non sblocchi niente e non cambia niente.

L unica cosa che forse ci sta di sto gioco sono le mappe che almeno quelle son carine..

che dire io a primo impatto mi sembrava un gioco bello e da provare ma poi ho scoperto che Ã¨ tutto meno che uno sparattutto per via della logica di merda delle armi....fatto completamente male a parere mio.
DELUSIONE TOTALE, lo sconsiglio a tutti a malincuore, non fatevi ingannare dal trailer e dalle immagini perchÃ¨ non Ã¨ niente di quello che vedete.

per quelli che magari romperanno le palle perchÃ¨ magari ho fatto errori grammaticali sappiate che qui non mene frega niente perchÃ¨ ci metterei 1 giorno se dovessi stare attento al minimo errore e non ho voglia.....

Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸. ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€-ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¹Ğº Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒÑ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ÑƒÑ.

Disclaimer: I bought this game for Gmod, and had no intention of playing it ever, until I started to play every single game on my account.

I think the game is very lacking, and I expected more from a Valve game to be honest.
Unfortunately the game's online community is not very active and it was hard to find a normal server with people in it.

When I finally did find a good server to play on, I didn't enjoy the gameplay at all. I think the setting they were going for (WW2) is poorly executed, gunplay is not fun either.
I do not like this game at all.

I wouldn't buy this game for the game, but for gmod textures.

This is one of the best WWII shooters I've played. It may be old yes but you will still find plenty of servers. Unlike the original DoD, it only has multiplayer although you can make a server yourself and I believe with a bit of tinkering adding bots is possible. Unlike BF1 or CoD, its fairly historically accurate, especially the weapons. The Germans have guns like the MP40, STG44 and the Karabiner 98 Kurz. The Americans have the M1 Garand, a Tommy gun and a Browning Automatic Rifle (BAR). As it is  WW2, the maps are cities or towns and games can be fast-paced due to rushes and machine-guns. The game isn't much for bolt-action rifles, as the only ones are the Kar98k and the M1 Garand which is semi automatic. And for the playerbase? Well there are heaps of servers, but the key is finding the right time so that the servers are almost full.

TL;DR, this game is an oldie but a goodie, definitely up there in the best WW2 FPS. Unfortunately, due to its age and the fact it's a Valve game, the graphics aren't very good. That can be a good thing for people who don't have very good gaming rigs, and a bad thing because it's 2017.
My rating: 9.5/10. Get it if you love FPS and WW2 games.

Top notch ww2 first person shooter, 10 out 10

A classic WW2 FPS for the ages. I love the original Day of Defeat, and this Source Engine overhaul is no exception compared to the original. Sure the British Army was completely removed, and certain classes and weapons were also removed, and even the fact that it was made over a decade ago, but it's still fun as hell to this day and has an amazing player base, with the community still adding on to it with things such as Gungame and working parachutes. I really hope we get a sequel at some point soon with the currently still in-development Source 2 Engine, but the possibility of this happening is slim.
Day of defeat Source um jogo  realmente muito louco,  pra quem curte   Guerras, recomendo muito pra quem gosta de jogar jogos de Guerras em Multiplayer.

ESP:

SegÃºn juegas vas descubriendo el lore, resulta que transcurre en un periodo histÃ³rico muy poco conocido llamado 2Âª Guerra Mundial (1939-1945) donde los Aliados se meten de ostias con el Eje por Europa, Ãfrica, Asia y PacÃ­fico. En aquel antiguo conflicto se podÃ­a observar montones de personas muriendo por tiros, granadazos, cuchilladas, paladas...
Este arena shooter plantea 2 paÃ­ses (EEUU y Alemania) y 6 personajes distintos, cada uno con su propia historia (Apoyo estadounidense por ejemplo vivÃ­a en una granja en Maine; Asalto alemÃ¡n trabajaba como contable en Hamburgo...) armamento (M1 Garand, K98, pala...) y habilidades (Granada propulsada, humo, 360 noscope...).
Como objetivo tienes que defender la gloria del 3er Reich o Llevar libertad a Italia, Francia y BÃ©lgica.

-Los objetivos dan mÃ¡s puntos que las kills :D, pero a veces son jodidÃ­simos D:
-Cada mapa es, o pasillero (malo), o con muchos sitios por los que meterse y rodear posiciones.
-Hay 2 modos de juego: DetonaciÃ³n (destruir objetivos en x tiempo) y Dominio (Tomar x posiciones y mantenerlas) de 16v16 mÃ¡ximo, aunque se pueden mezclar.
-Armas (18 en total) con sonidos crudos, potentes, que se te van de las manos...
-La precisiÃ³n depende del movimiento o posiciÃ³n que tengas o de tu pulso de neurocirujano.
-Puedes saltar, agacharte, tumbarte, esprintar, correr, andar, mirar alrededor, disparar o luchar cuerpo a cuerpo.
-SensaciÃ³n de combate callejero con ametralladoras, francotiradores y spam de granadas.
-Usa Source Engine (el de HL2 y otros), por lo que no necesitas un glorious PC gaming master race.
  8'8/10'1       -Too much WWII: IGN


ENG:

As you play you discover the lore, apparently it is set in a pretty little known period called World War 2, where the Allies fight against the Axis along Europe, Africa, Asia and the Pacific. in that antique conflict you could see lots of people dying because of shots, grenades, knifes, spades...
This arena shooter sets 2 countries (USA and Germany) and 6 different characters, each one with his own history (US Support lived in a farm in Maine; German Assault worked as accountant in Hamburg...) weaponry (M1 Garand, K98, spade...) and abilities (Rifle grenade, smoke, 360 noscope...).
As objective you have to defend the glory of the 3rd Reich or spread the freedom for Italy, France or Belgium.

-PTFO gives more points than the kills :D, but sometimes it's pretty difficult D:
-Each map is corridoresque (bad thing) or with a lot of places to flank positions.
-2 game modes: Detonation (destroy objectives in x time) and Domination (Take x positions and hold them) of 16v16 max, and sometimes they mix.
-Weapons (18 at all) with crude, powerful sounds, which look like they have own life.
-Aiming that depends in the movement and position or in your neurosurgeon's pulse.
-You can jump, crouch, go prone, sprint, run, walk, look around, shoot and perform melee fights.
-Urban combat feeling with MGs, snipers and grenade spam.
-Powered by Source Engine (the same as HL2 and others) so you don't need a glorious PC gaming master race.
  8'8/10'1     -Too much WWII: IGN
The best FPS ever. I tend to get back to this game after big pauses and it's still fun

Of all the Valve games I have played, this is the only one that I keep going back to.    Well balanced weapons, instead of a sniper only game (CS with AWP).  Like to run and gun?  play Assault class... cowardly sniper?  or camping Squad machine gun? Standard rifleman.  There is a gun for all styles of play.  Not one of them is over powered compared to the rest.  

After years of playing, there are still full servers and plenty of people playing.  Unlike many games, this game tends to attract a more mature player base.  I almost never hear some 12 yr old screaming 'NOOB" or any other such nonsense.  The community is friendly.

I really wish that Valve would update this game, but they don't seem interested in it at all.  Its too bad, because I consider this to be Valves best game.   

For its price, I highly recommend it.
It is good in all but sine the community is so small it's not easy finding a game and it has a higher skill ceiling than tf2
I mean... I know this game is supposed to be laughed at... but damn, this is so bad. I'm actually embarrassed that it's in my library.

Fun gam

[h1]Overview[/h1]
DODS or Day of Defeat: Source is a Source Engine game made by Valve. It is a Class-Based FPS MMO World War II Simulator featuring the U.S. VS Wehrmacht.


[h1]Pros[/h1]
-Looks nice for the time it was created.
-Gameplay is smooth and fun.
-Can't capture points unless there are two people on it.
-Only a select few classes so that everybody has a role to play. Assault,Support,Sniper,Rifle-Man,Launcher-Man.
-Only with certain guns you can aim down the sights. I like this, it proves challenging and teaches you to handle recoil.
-Killing people is realistic, It doesn't take to long nor is it too easy to kill someone. 
-Shovel
-I HAVE SOOOOO MUCH FPS MUHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAH
-You can break a wardrobe with your bare fist.
-Realistic aiming sights.


[h1]Cons[/h1]
-Sadly, it gets boring after a while. Maybe skins and customization would give this game some life.
-There are die hard real world veterans and veteran supporters in this game. Don't piss them off.
-The community is pretty bad.
-Can't play offline with bots without a mod.
-Needs more game-modes.


[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
It's pretty fun, if want to add some spice to the game, just go to gamebanana and download some mods. I would recommend this realistic team based FPS.

Day of Defeat: Source, Ã© um jogo que nÃ£o Ã© muito do meu genero mas... eu recomendo 100%!.

It's really casual and easy to jump in and play. The maps are very linear, and have small points that branch out, so it isn't open world. The weapons are balanced though, and the snipers aren't overpowered. Like I said, it's casual. There is no ranking up system or leveling up classes or collecting battle packs or any of that. I like it though, it's fun to play and meet new people too. 8/10 overall.
